Since they all cover the same distance, we can set the total distance they cover to be equal to the distance from the starting point to D, which we can assume to be 1 unit.

Thus, we have the equation: 1/(2t) + 1/t + 1/(6t) = 1. 

Simplifying the equation, we get: (3/2)t = 1, which gives us t = 2/3.
